import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { listEvents } from "../actions/eventActions"; import Loader from "../components/Loader"; import Hero from "../components/Hero"; import EventCard from "../components/EventCard"; import EventFilter from "../components/EventFilter"; export default function HomeScreen() { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const { loading, error, events } = useSelector((s) => s.eventList); const [filters, setFilters] = useState({}); const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('all'); useEffect(() => { dispatch(listEvents(filters)); }, [dispatch, filters]); const handleTabChange = (tab, filterValue) => { setActiveTab(tab); if (typeof filterValue === 'object') { setFilters({ ...filters, ...filterValue }); } else { setFilters({ ...filters, when: filterValue }); } }; return (
{/* Section Header */}

Discover Amazing Events

Explore events happening in your area and find your next adventure

{/* Enhanced Filter Tabs */}
{/* Enhanced Filter Section */}
{/* Events Content */}
{loading ? (

Finding amazing events...

Please wait while we load the latest events

) : error ? (

Oops! Something went wrong

{String(error)}

) : events.length === 0 ? (

No Events Found

We couldn't find any events matching your criteria. Try adjusting your filters or check back later.

) : (
{events.length} event{events.length !== 1 ? 's' : ''} found
{events.map((event) => ( ))}
)}
{/* Enhanced Call to Action Section */} {!loading && events.length > 0 && (

Have an Event in Mind?

Share your event with the community and connect with like-minded people

)}
); }
